    Testing Polygons Spatial Association

    Testing Ecological Patches

    Lucas da Cunha Godoy

    01-24-2017

    polygons-association-ecological-patches.Rmd

    Testing if two sets of polygons have some kind of association is not an easy task. The proof of that is that we don’t have a method implemented in neither in R or ArcGIS to do it. So, by a request from researchers from ESRI (the company from ArcGIS), I developed an algorithm based on the paper from (Lotwick and Silverman 1982). The usage is illustrated below.

    Usage

    References

    Lotwick, HW, and BW Silverman. 1982. “Methods for Analysing Spatial Processes of Several Types of Points.” Journal of the Royal Statistical Society. Series B (Methodological). JSTOR, 406–13.
